intro: Petrocodon wenshanensis, commonly known as the Wenshan petrocodon, is a rare flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Papaveraceae, which includes poppies and other flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its delicate, colorful flowers and is often found in rocky or mountainous habitats. It has small, elliptical leaves and produces capsules as its fruit. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a vulnerable species.
